dict.acceptation: 发动机，引擎；工具；火车头；机车；

sent.orig: In the third chapter, we construct a shadow engine based on the Tyr Shading Engine.
sent.trans: 本文第三章描述了在Tyr Shading Engine的基础上，架构了一个针对阴影算法的Shadow Engine的实现。

sent.orig: The developments of MEMS, Micro Machining technology make it possible to fabricate Micro Turbine Engine(MTE).
sent.trans: MEMS技术、微加工技术的发展，使得微型涡轮喷气发动机(Micro Turbine Engine,MTE)的制造成为可能。

sent.orig: SKY has three inference engines: object inference engine. rule set inference engine and method inference engine.
sent.trans: SKY拥有三部推理机：对象推理机、规则集推理机和方法推理机。

sent.orig: The Rules Processing Engine consists of a Rules Engine, a Variable Engine, and an Expression Machine.
sent.trans: 规则处理引擎，构成一个规则引擎，一个变量的引擎，并表达了机器。

sent.orig: Lower the engine and engine support cushions onto the engine compartment brackets.
sent.trans: 降低引擎和引擎支撑坐垫到引擎室托架上。
